verses.verse: Unto the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> of Ephesus <S%G2179><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he that holdeth <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> who walketh <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks; <S%G3087><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> labor, <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G941><s%> them which are evil: <S%G2556><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast tried <S%G3985><s%> them which say <S%G5335><s%> they are <S%G1511><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> liars: <S%G5571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> hast borne, <S%G941><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for my name's sake <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%> hast labored, <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast not <S%G3756><s%> fainted. <S%G2577><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat against <S%G2596><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast left <S%G863><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from whence <S%G4159><s%> thou art fallen, <S%G1601><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> repent, <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> or else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> quickly, <S%G5034><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will remove <S%G2795><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> candlestick <S%G3087><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G848><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> thou repent. <S%G3340><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thou hast, <S%G2192><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hatest <S%G3404><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Nicolaitanes, <S%G3531><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> hate. <S%G3404><s%>

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> churches; <S%G1577><s%> To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tree <S%G3586><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> paradise <S%G3857><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> in Smyrna <S%G4668><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> last, <S%G2078><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is alive; <S%G2198><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> poverty, <S%G4432><s%> (but <S%G1161><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> rich) <S%G4145><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I know the <S%G3588><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> of them which say <S%G3004><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> are the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

Fear <S%G5399><s%> none <S%G3367><s%> of those things which <S%G3739><s%> thou shalt <S%G3195><s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1228><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be tried; <S%G3985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall have <S%G2192><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> days; <S%G2250><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> thou faithful <S%G4103><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> churches; <S%G1577><s%> He that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> be hurt <S%G91><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Pergamos <S%G4010><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he which hath <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%> with two edges; <S%G1366><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> thou dwellest, <S%G2730><s%> even where <S%G3699><s%> Satan's <S%G4567><s%> seat <S%G2362><s%> is: and <S%G2532><s%> thou holdest fast <S%G2902><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast not <S%G3756><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> was my <S%G3450><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> martyr, <S%G3144><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was slain <S%G615><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> dwelleth. <S%G2730><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Balaam, <S%G903><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> Balac <S%G904><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4625><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed unto idols, <S%G1494><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to commit fornication. <S%G4203><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Nicolaitanes, <S%G3531><s%> which thing <S%G3739><s%> I hate. <S%G3404><s%>

Repent; <S%G3340><s%> or else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will fight <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> churches; <S%G1577><s%> To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hidden <S%G2928><s%> <S%G3588><s%> manna, <S%G3131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> stone, <S%G5586><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone <S%G5586><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> saving <S%G1508><s%> he that receiveth <S%G2983><s%> it.

And <S%G2532><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who hath <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G848><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> like unto <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> fine brass; <S%G5474><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> service, <S%G1248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> to be more <S%G4119><s%> than the <S%G3588><s%> first. <S%G4413><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> thou sufferest <S%G1439><s%> that woman <S%G1135><s%> Jezebel, <S%G2403><s%> which calleth <S%G3004><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> a prophetess, <S%G4398><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to seduce <S%G4105><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to commit fornication, <S%G4203><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed unto idols. <S%G1494><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I gave <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G846><s%> space <S%G5550><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G848><s%> fornication; <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she repented <S%G3340><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will cast <S%G906><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a bed, <S%G2825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G848><s%> deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I will kill <S%G615><s%> her <S%G848><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death; <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> shall know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he which searcheth <S%G2045><s%> the reins <S%G3510><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> unto every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5213><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unto the rest <S%G3062><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> depths <S%G899><s%> of Satan, <S%G4567><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they speak; <S%G3004><s%> I will put <S%G906><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> burden. <S%G922><s%>
But <S%G4133><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> already hold fast <S%G2902><s%> till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3757><s%> I come. <S%G2240><s%> <S%G302><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he that overcometh, <S%G3528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the end, <S%G5056><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> nations: <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he shall rule <S%G4165><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> vessels <S%G4632><s%> of a potter <S%G2764><s%> shall they be broken to shivers: <S%G4937><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> morning <S%G4407><s%> star. <S%G792><s%>
He that hath <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> churches. <S%G1577><s%>
